name: Hive Survive
description:
All hail the Queen!!

Hive Survive is a survival game that sees you take command of your own wasp, the goal? Survive as long as possible and enlarge your swarm by hunting, killing, and carrying other insects to your queen.

But be careful there are many dangers along the way, the spiders glowing red eyes belay their evil intent and they have acquired a taste for Wasps, if they get the chance to call their friends you will be in trouble fast.

How long can your hive survive? Increase your swarm to survive!

If you like to game help us out by donating a few dollars, it goes a long way to helping us pursue our dream.

This game was originally designed for android and can be found at the below Google Play link.

Find out more about the game (why we made it?) and GGD at our website Here.
